previewArticle.title: LA Galaxy vs. Chicago Fire | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: LA Galaxy 2, Chicago Fire 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: We're live. Watch #LAvCHI online here: http://t.co/fej0wkWXFq #OpeningWeekend

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses the top right corner following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Marc Serber
timelineItems.text: I wonder if Chicago practiced corners yesterday? Will they try for an Olimpico? #LAvCHI #MLS #MLS20

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: Chicago. Anor numbers behind the ball and very direct to start , this will be interesting to see how la deals with the counter #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: 2WhiteGuysTalkFutbol
timelineItems.text: Villareal looking great so far #LAGalaxy #LAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Harrison Shipp.
Chris Ritter (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Leonardo (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Firehouse Soccer
timelineItems.text: New backline showing its lack of time together. This should only last a few games #cf97

timelineItems.name: Adrian™✌
timelineItems.text: Just another season opener 😊#LA #lagalaxy #galaxy #seasonopener

timelineItems.name: Tom Ziemer
timelineItems.text: If I'm LA and I see Larentowicz tracking Zardes, I'm playing the ball in behind all night. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Eric Gehrig.
Attempt missed. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the right is close, but misses to the right following a corner.
Foul by Leonardo (LA Galaxy).
Quincy Amarikwa (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: LAG Confidential
timelineItems.text: Galaxy playing a lot of balls over the top. Last year, this was rare. Could be a stylistic shift towards more counter oriented play #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Robert Jackson
timelineItems.text: Ishizaki with two ambitious strikes to the side netting. Still, LA dominating so why not. #LAvCHI #MLS

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Jose Villarreal is taking his smooth demeanor and added the quickness and urgency I’ve always imagined him to need. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy).
Sean Johnson (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: LAG Confidential
timelineItems.text: The rumors of Ishizaki stepping up as main chance creator seem to be exaggerated. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Ryan Sealock
timelineItems.text: So I’m hoping we get a shot on goal this half #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Leonardo (LA Galaxy).
Quincy Amarikwa (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Kevin Garcia
timelineItems.text: ¡90 minutos del deporte más hermoso del mundo! #LaGalaxy #ChicagoFire

timelineItems.comment: Kenney Walker (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Chris Ritter (Chicago Fire).

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 19' Kenney Walker looking really confident in the center of the park. Not many bad passes as he keeps play relatively simple. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, LA Galaxy 2, Chicago Fire 0.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: FT: The #LAGalaxy have started 2015 right where they left off. http://t.co/4vI8PRanmZ #LAvCHI http://t.co/RU8fsNWOx9

timelineItems.name: Chicago Fire WUFC
timelineItems.text: FT 2-0 LA. Outplayed most of the time, it was a well deserved loss. May the mistakes be lessons learned. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Bryan Allen
timelineItems.text: Do Prado was the best player for the Fire..he played roughly 20 minutes in a non competitive match. #CF97 Keane was actually on Fire. #MLS

timelineItems.name: Jason Saghini
timelineItems.text: Brian Rowe didn't wow me. Wonder why Penedo didn't play 7 whether he'll be back next week for the champs. #LAvCHI #MLSFantasy 7pts in bag

timelineItems.desc: Major League Soccer’ 20th season kicks off on Viernes de Futbol as the defending champion LA Galaxy play host to the Chicago Fire on Friday evening at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: LA Galaxy vs Chicago Fire | March 6, 2015

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Robbie Keane volleys home a stunner. WATCH: http://t.co/kXzT3Ya3OV #LAvCHI http://t.co/k8HHcLqv2o

timelineItems.desc: MLSsoccer.com's Katie Witham talks with the LA Galaxy's Gyasi Zardes, Jose Villarreal and the Chicago Fire's Frank Yallop after the Galaxy defeated the Fire 2-0 in the opening match of the 2015 MLS season.
timelineItems.title: Villarreal, Zardes and Yallop react to Galaxy 2-0 Win over Fire in season opener | MLS Now

timelineItems.desc: Shaun Maloney (Chicago Fire) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Shaun Maloney gets booked in his welcome to MLS

timelineItems.name: Drew Zuhosky
timelineItems.text: 20' Not much goin' on here so far. #LAGalaxy are, however, outclassing Chicago. #LAvCHI #MLS #OpeningWeekend
Go #lagalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Shaun Maloney (Chicago Fire).
Juninho (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Alex Shamiryan
timelineItems.text: At the La Galaxy game. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: .@landondonovan getting to enjoy this one as a fan. #ThanksLD #LAvCHI http://t.co/i6pq7hBQ0w

timelineItems.name: FootballrUSA
timelineItems.text: @LAGalaxy really controlling the match so far. Pressing up into the final 3rd and making the keeper work. #LAvCHI #MLS @MLS #FootballrUSA

timelineItems.name: Victor Jacobo
timelineItems.text: Sean Johnson tried channeling is inner Manuel Neuer right there. #cf97 #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kenney Walker (LA Galaxy).
Chris Ritter (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Tom Ziemer
timelineItems.text: Also, I find it odd that Yallop would play Maloney in the middle of a 4-4-2 instead of Shipp. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: BIKE: Stefan Ishizaki goes up for a bike but misses wide

timelineItems.name: Andrew Schmidt
timelineItems.text: I don’t like seeing Keane hanging back so often. Taking himself out of the game. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Gerry Barragan
timelineItems.text: LA Galaxy season opener vs.chicago fire #LAGalaxy  #LARS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Maggie Smet
timelineItems.text: Soccer is the only sport I actually care about. #LAGalaxy with @cate_nugget

timelineItems.name: Ryan Sealock
timelineItems.text: Offense is pathetic. Rather than hold possession and try to create let’s just hoof it #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Jose Villarreal (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Matt Watson (Chicago Fire).

timelineItems.name: Robert Jackson
timelineItems.text: I mean, that was a great athletic display by Ishizaki but these commentators need to calm down. So wide of the net lol #LAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Offside, LA Galaxy. Juninho tries a through ball, but Robbie Keane is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Rigo Maranon
timelineItems.text: Opening Day: LA Galaxy vs Chicago Deep Dish FC #ThisIsLA #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Conner
timelineItems.text: Villarreal needs to stop crossing the ball and take some initiative. He's too skillful to give the ball to someone like Zardes... #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: AU
timelineItems.text: Ritter needs to be more active.. Theres no reason Maloney needs to come so deep for the ball. That should be Ritter. #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Juninho.

timelineItems.name: Marc Gowland
timelineItems.text: Kick off to the 2015 season.  #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: LAG Confidential
timelineItems.text: Keane has 0 shots as he looks to be a playmaker. You want Keane shooting, folks. That's his game. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Eric Gehrig (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Zardes gives me flashbacks of Altidore in his early #RBNY days. So dangerous -- and so much potential. #MLS #LAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Jeff Larentowicz.

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: Zardes doing a nice job of finding spaces while Chicago is ball watching, showing some maturity to his game #LAGalaxy #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Robbie Mustoe
timelineItems.text: A matter of time. The Fire all over the place defensively. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Javier Duarte
timelineItems.text: Kickoff! #LAvCHI
Tis the season! #lagalaxy #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: LA with sustained possession after the corner, but the Fire doing their best to get in front of shots and prevent Johnson from being tested.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Jose Villarreal (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Stefan Ishizaki with a cross.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matt Watson (Chicago Fire).
Kenney Walker (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Robbie Keane starting to find that “Robbie Keane Space.” Chicago back 4 not coming out to take it away from him. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Jose Villarreal (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Stefan Ishizaki with a cross.

timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Gyasi Zardes can't quite reach the open tap-in

timelineItems.name: Brucieee
timelineItems.text: UGHHH Zardes needs to come out and Gordon NEEDS to come in @LAGalaxy #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Ryan Taulbee
timelineItems.text: I see we're going to have another "shoot at the goal every chance you get but somehow only score once" kinda season again #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Robbie Keane curls it just wide of the post

timelineItems.name: Women United FC
timelineItems.text: Inject the confidence in Gyasi to finish it. We know he can. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Xak Brown
timelineItems.text: #cf97 Ritter does not look good. He is forcing igbo and Maloney back #cf97 #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Sooooo close. #LAvCHI http://t.co/8J6szhBNOB

timelineItems.name: Lucas Hammer
timelineItems.text: Can someone help me figure out what's missing from the offense? Plenty of players, no cohesion. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Adrian Melville
timelineItems.text: Impressive first half from Jose Villarreal. Working with Robbie Rogers LA has a big advantage up the left side #LAvCHI #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Shaun Maloney (Chicago Fire) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
First Half ends, LA Galaxy 0, Chicago Fire 0.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Maloney has had a Jarju-esque DP debut. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Jeff Carlisle
timelineItems.text: The #lagalaxy nearly wore a groove into the turf on the right wing, getting closer. Halftime whistle comes just in time for #cf97.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer

timelineItems.name: Jason Saghini
timelineItems.text: Not too shabby @MLS... very shabby by Villareal on the finish, though. #MLS #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: And here's the highlight. Just over the bar: http://t.co/psuAFVvPTm #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Jeremy Mikula
timelineItems.text: Gehrig looked pretty good for #cf97 in that half. He's read the game well to make interceptions and do enough to put LA players off. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Nick Green
timelineItems.text: Did the #ChicagoFire even touch the ball inside the #LAGalaxy penalty area? LA. Should be up by at least of couple of goals. HT: 0-0

timelineItems.name: Aaron Sharpsteen
timelineItems.text: #cf97 Never a good sign when Maloney and Shipp have to come back so far to get touches on the ball. Gonna be a long second half.

timelineItems.name: Alexi Lalas
timelineItems.text: What. Was. That? Chicago. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: REILLY張
timelineItems.text: #LAgalaxy season opener! #VSCOcam #vsco

timelineItems.name: Marty Bermudez
timelineItems.text: Second half, get that goal LA!!! #RaceToSeis #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.text: O Captain, My Captain. #LAGalaxy #Keane #Ireland #MLS #Cartwheels #Poetry #WaltWhitman

timelineItems.name: Shane Murray
timelineItems.text: Two positives from the first half: 1) Gehrig is a beast in the air, very impressive, and 2) Igboananike is fast. Very fast! #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: Is there anything Landon Donovan isn't good at? Show off. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 9-5-5 - @LAGalaxy have a 9-5-5 record in their 19 home openers in @MLS, outscoring opponents 32-23 in these games. Welcome. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.text: Villarreal scores as Chicago D regresses to the mean. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Shane Murray
timelineItems.text: Palmer should be screaming to clear or at least let Larentowicz know he's there. Sloppy defending. Good finish by Villareal. #cf97 #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Ben Baer
timelineItems.text: And that's why you pick up and start an LA Galaxy player half an hour before the game. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Kennedy Igboananike (Chicago Fire) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 69' Goal scorer Jose Villarreal gives way for Alan Gordon. Look for Zardes to move into the left side of midfield and Gordon to play up top.

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Bruce, at home and up 1-0, makes two attack-minded subs. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.text: At LA Galaxy soccer game. Favorite sport growing. #LAGalaxy #Soccer👌👌👌

timelineItems.comment: Quincy Amarikwa (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy).
Foul by Guly (Chicago Fire).
Juninho (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Austin Moore Farrow
timelineItems.text: To be completely honest, I thought that was a red at first. Not so sure on the replay but Do Prado should have no complaints. Silly. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Quincy Amarikwa (Chicago Fire) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Neal Lewis
timelineItems.text: Igboananike probably cramped up trying to get out of Omar Gonzalez's pocket. Not impressed by his debut today. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Larentowicz Face. #LarentowiczFace #LAvCHI http://t.co/CDbgxvaPCW

timelineItems.comment: Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Shaun Maloney (Chicago Fire).
Foul by Chris Ritter (Chicago Fire).
Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: BigHeadedSports
timelineItems.text: Not shocked, but Galaxy pushing forward HARD. Really need to see Fire fight back them setting the pace. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Keane WIDE open for a tap in but Ishizaki decides to shoot. Should be been a second. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 2, Chicago Fire 0. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the center of the box to the high center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: GOAL REPLAY: Robbie Keane's wonderful volley

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 2, Chicago Fire 0. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the center of the box to the high center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Robbie Keane volleys home a stunner

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Robbie Keane.

timelineItems.name: Josh Becker
timelineItems.text: Also, he's got the advantage of playing against a deeper lying Galaxy, but Polster has been an upgrade from Ritter #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Alan Gordon (LA Galaxy).
Shaun Maloney (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: The MVP all alone in the box and he smashes in LA's second. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Christ what a header from Husidic. And remember: @LAGalaxy got him for nothing. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: LeeLee
timelineItems.text: Wow Baggio! Nice head flick to the king Robbie Keane!! Omar's passing and defending tonight is on point! #LAGalaxy #Champions #MLS

timelineItems.name: Jeffren Freiberg
timelineItems.text: Can we talk about Omar Gonzalez spraying the ball all over the field tonight on a dime? #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Robbie Keane just went into beast mode. Dribbling right through two fire players. Keano is rolling. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Joevin Jones (Chicago Fire).
Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Guly (Chicago Fire).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Jose Villarreal slots in the first goal of the MLS season: http://t.co/TITJULOhuu #LAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy).
Shaun Maloney (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: LAG Confidential
timelineItems.text: We now have a staggered mid. The Y formation as @MLSAnalyst calls it. Walker didn't provide that. Makes a big difference #LAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Baggio Husidic.

timelineItems.name: Jack Mangan
timelineItems.text: Larentowicz arguably responsible for both Galaxy goals. Not a great start for such a highly touted defender. Bad omen for Fire #LAvCHI #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy).
Guly (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Anthony Jimenez
timelineItems.text: Robbie Keane makes everyone around him so much better. One reason I'm hopeful for Van der Vaart. Keane is 2 years older by the way. #LAvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Joevin Jones (Chicago Fire) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.
Foul by Alan Gordon (LA Galaxy).
Eric Gehrig (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Alex Baker
timelineItems.text: Rowe got lucky on that one, bounced right off Amarikwa, could've gone anywhere but went over luckily. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses the top right corner following a set piece.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Sean Johnson denies an early Jose Villarreal free kick

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Jose Villarreal (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: bthomp30
timelineItems.text: MLS season opener #lagalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Harrison Shipp (Chicago Fire).

timelineItems.name: Austin Guerrero
timelineItems.text: So close! #LAGalaxy #soccer #MlS #slowmo @gyasinho

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chicago Fire. Conceded by Robbie Rogers.

timelineItems.name: Neil Sherwin
timelineItems.text: New season, new players, same Fire. At least they didn't draw though, right? #cf97 #LAvCHI

timelineItems.name: Ace McCloud®
timelineItems.text: #cf97 no shame losing to the best team in the league on the road still wish we had a better performance.

timelineItems.name: tonyboisselle
timelineItems.text: #lagalaxy #losangeles #stubhubcenter #firsttofive #mlscupchampions

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chicago Fire. Conceded by A.J. DeLaGarza.
Attempt blocked. Harrison Shipp (Chicago Fire) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Jeff Larentowicz with a headed pass.
Second Half ends, LA Galaxy 2, Chicago Fire 0.
